Name: Name
ServiceContracts1: Ask about annual service contracts that include preventative maintenance for your laboratory equipment. Quotations for on-site repair, IQ/OQ/PQ and application and method development are available on request. In addition to our extensive supply of parts and complete systems, we also have service support for your existing laboratory equipment. Please inquire about parts repair services on an exchange basis.
ServiceContracts2: Simply fill out the form below to create a service request for your existing equipment, make a maintenance agreement and similar options. We will get back to you as soon as possible...
Headline: Headline
PriceWarning: *You can leave the currency and price sections as blank to request a quote.
Guarantee1: Preowned used laboratory equipment is refurbished, to meet original manufacturer's specifications, by experienced engineers and inventoried at labAlsat headquarters. labAlsat offers customized upgrades and accessories as well as warranties ranging from ninety days to two years to meet the customer's specific needs. labAlsat stands behind the operation of the refurbished lab equipment sells with a money-back guarantee.
BroadScope1: labAlsat maintains a large inventory of refurbished analytical lab instruments and accessories from leading manufacturers such as ABI Sciex, Agilent, Thermo, Waters, Bruker, Perkin Elmer, Shimadzu, Hitachi, JEOL, Knauer and others. The equipment includes mass spectrometers (LC/MS, LC/MSMS, GC/MS, GC/MSMS), HPLC, gas chromatographs (GC), ultra high pressure liquid chromatographs (UPLC/UHPLC), centrifuges, elemental analyzers, atomic absorption, inductively coupled plasma (ICP), uv-vis, infrared, X-ray, and nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectrometers. Preowned used lab equipment is refurbished by experienced engineers and presented at labAlsat headquarters, powered by Pronitron Analitik Cihazlar Ltd. Sti.
ServEngineer1: As labAlsat, we welcome your technical support needs for all brands and models of laboratory equipments. This platform acts as a bridge between the service provider and the customer. You determine your needs, and the service engineers registered in our system will quote for the service you request. If you deem it appropriate, we will direct our registered service engineer to you. This service is provided by our reliable service engineers who have been approved by us and are certified in the relevant subject. labAlsat assurance is always with you.
WarrantiesTechSup1: Independent and original manufacturers' service are made available in the Istanbul / TURKEY to insure a timely response if services are required. Training is available at LabAlsat headquarter, Kadıköy İSTANBUL or at the customer's site upon request. Most importantly, free telephone technical support is available after labAlsat refurbished lab equipment is delivered and installed. labAlsat stands behind the operation of the refurbished lab equipment it sells with a money-back guarantee, provided that the equipment is not damaged or misused by customer, and all proper maintenance is performed.

TC7: labAlsat offers many services free of charge. These services include, but are not limited to, browsing, searching, signing up and bidding. We reserve the right to change our fee schedule at any time without notice. Notice of any charges to your account will be sent before they occur. All fees for labAlsat services are given in Turkish Lira (TRL) or US Dollars (USD). Users are responsible for paying all fees and applicable taxes incurred while using labAlsat services.
TC9: 3.1 WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT A BUYER OR SELLER WILL COMPLETE A TRANSACTION. Although listings provide a forum for buyers and sellers to negotiate price and purchase used and surplus laboratory equipment, labAlsat is not a traditional auction platform. labAlsat acts as a media service that allows anyone to bid, sell, request and buy anything related to the laboratory, medical or test/measurement fields at any time, from anywhere in the world, in many different formats. LabAlsat cannot exercise any control over the quality, safety or legality of the advertised products. labAlsat also does not have the ability to verify the authenticity or accuracy of listed products, sellers' ability to sell items, or buyers' ability to purchase items. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT A BUYER OR SELLER WILL COMPLETE A TRANSACTION.
TC10: 3.2 User Authentication. Due to the anonymous nature of the Internet, it is difficult and sometimes impossible to verify the alleged identity of every user. labAlsat also encourages direct communication with potential commercial partners through the tools available on our site. To add an additional level of security to any transaction, labAlsat recommends using a third-party payment service or escrow provider when dealing with an unknown person or company.
TC11: 3.3 Version. labAlsat only provides the 'service' that connects buyers and sellers. labAlsat is not involved in actual processing other than the marketing activities of its own products. In the event of a dispute with one or more users, labAlsat (its officers, directors, agents, employees and affiliates) is exempt from claims, demands and (actual and consequential) damages of any kind and nature, known and unknown.
TC12: 3.4 Information Control. labAlsat does not control the information provided by any user and made available through the labAlsat system. TC14: 4.1 Listing Description. All users must be able to legally sell any product(s) offered for sale on the labAlsat.com website. A full description of the product, including all terms of sale, should appear on the listing page. Listings may contain text descriptions, graphics, images, and other content related to the sale of that product. All listed items must be listed in an appropriate category. If no category is selected, labAlsat will categorize each classified ad or product as it sees fit.
TC16: 4.2 Price Manipulation. Price manipulation is prohibited. If labAlsat detects that a user has manipulated or attempted to manipulate the final selling price of any product, that user will be promptly removed from the labAlsat system without notice.
TC17: 4.3 Fraud. In addition to other penalties, labAlsat may suspend or terminate the user account if fraud is suspected. Any report of fraudulent behavior at labAlsat is taken very seriously and thoroughly investigated.
TC18: 4.4 Cancellations and Refunds. As a seller of an item, withdrawal of any item from sale is only acceptable if the item is damaged or stolen during the time between its initial listing date and its release date, or if the condition or description is not in conformity. TC24: labAlsat is a forum dedicated to meeting the needs of scientific, medical and test/measurement users around the world. labAlsat provides this free service to help users find outdated or 'hard to find' equipment. Use of this service is limited as follows:
TC25: 6.1 Non-Commercial Use. labAlsat Wanted Ads should not be used to encourage traffic to another website or to promote a commercial effort. labAlsat Wanted Ads will be used by individuals or companies looking to find a tool, accessory or part for their own use. Searched Ads are not intended for use by companies that wish to purchase tools or equipment for immediate resale or repair and resale. All Searched Ads that are clearly commercial or perceived to be commercial by labAlsat will be removed from the labAlsat system without notice. Sellers are encouraged to use the labAlsat Announcement ads or purchase the Miscellaneous Items Wanted ad to find equipment to resell.
TC26: 6.2 Related Claims. The scope of labAlsat Wanted Ads is limited. Ads must be about scientific, medical claims
TC27: 6.3 All Rights Reserved. labAlsat reserves the right to approve or reject a Searched Ad for any reason it sees fit, without explanation or notice.
